```php
<?php

use Dodopayments\Client;

$sdk = new Client(accessToken: 'YOUR_TOKEN');

$response = $sdk->products->listProductsHandler(
  pageSize: 9,
  pageNumber: 7,
  archived: true,
  recurring: true,
  brandId: "brand_id"
);

print_r($response);

```
